title: Ticket #6264: Allow retries on splices
description:
As part of filling out the feature set on splices, we should allow retries (as we already do on sub-DAGs). If we allow retries on splices, it would remove one of the biggest reasons that people have to use sub-DAGs.

I guess this feature would not allowed if you had pin connections in the relevant splice...

(Also see #1309: DAGMan: retry subset of a DAG.)
creator: wenger
